# GD

**Geographical Detectors for Assessing Spatial Factors**

Please cite **GD** as:

> Song, Y., Wang, J., Ge, Y. & Xu, C. (2020) An optimal parameters-based
> geographical detector model enhances geographic characteristics of
> explanatory variables for spatial heterogeneity analysis: Cases with
> different types of spatial data, *GIScience & Remote Sensing*,*57*(5),
> 593-610. <https://doi.org/10.1080/15481603.2020.1760434>.

A BibTeX entry for LaTeX users is:

``` bib
@article{Song2020opgd,
author = {Yongze Song, Jinfeng Wang, Yong Ge and Chengdong Xu},
title = {An optimal parameters-based geographical detector model enhances geographic characteristics of explanatory variables for spatial heterogeneity analysis: cases with different types of spatial data},
journal = {GIScience \& Remote Sensing},
volume = {57},
number = {5},
pages = {593--610},
year = {2020},
month = {05},
publisher = {Taylor \& Francis},
doi = {10.1080/15481603.2020.1760434},
URL = {https://doi.org/10.1080/15481603.2020.1760434}
}
```

## Installation

- Install from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=GD) with:

``` r
install.packages("GD")
```

- Install development binary version from
  [R-universe](https://ausgis.r-universe.dev/GD) with:

``` r
install.packages("GD",repos = c("https://ausgis.r-universe.dev",
                                "https://cloud.r-project.org"))
```

- Install development source version from
  [GitHub](https://github.com/ausgis/GD) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("ausgis/GD",build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

# Package index

## Model

- [`gdm()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdm.md)
  [`print(`*`<gdm>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdm.md)
  [`plot(`*`<gdm>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdm.md) :
  Geographical detectors: a one-step function.
- [`gd()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gd.md)
  [`print(`*`<gd>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gd.md)
  [`plot(`*`<gd>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gd.md) :
  Geographical detectors: factor detector.
- [`gdinteract()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdinteract.md)
  [`print(`*`<gdinteract>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdinteract.md)
  [`plot(`*`<gdinteract>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdinteract.md)
  : Geographical detectors: interaction detector.
- [`gdeco()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdeco.md)
  [`print(`*`<gdeco>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdeco.md)
  [`plot(`*`<gdeco>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdeco.md)
  : Geographical detectors: ecological detector.
- [`gdrisk()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdrisk.md)
  [`print(`*`<gdrisk>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdrisk.md)
  [`plot(`*`<gdrisk>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/gdrisk.md)
  : Geographical detectors: risk detector.
- [`sesu()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/sesu.md) : Comparison
  of size effects of spatial units.

## Utils

- [`disc()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/disc.md) : Generates
  discretization parameters for continuous data.
- [`optidisc()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/optidisc.md)
  [`print(`*`<optidisc>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/optidisc.md)
  [`plot(`*`<optidisc>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/optidisc.md)
  : Optimal discretization for continuous variables and visualization.
- [`v2m()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/v2m.md) : Converts a
  vector to a lower triangular matrix.
- [`riskmean()`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/riskmean.md)
  [`print(`*`<riskmean>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/riskmean.md)
  [`plot(`*`<riskmean>`*`)`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/riskmean.md)
  : Geographical detectors: risk means in risk detector.

## Data

- [`ndvi_5`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/NDVI.md)
  [`ndvi_10`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/NDVI.md)
  [`ndvi_20`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/NDVI.md)
  [`ndvi_30`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/NDVI.md)
  [`ndvi_40`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/NDVI.md)
  [`ndvi_50`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/NDVI.md) : Spatial
  datasets of vegetation index changes.
- [`h1n1_50`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/H1N1.md)
  [`h1n1_100`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/H1N1.md)
  [`h1n1_150`](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/reference/H1N1.md) : Spatial
  datasets of H1N1 flu incidences

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Optimal Parameters-based Geographical Detectors (OPGD) Model for
  Spatial Heterogeneity Analysis and Factor
  Exploration](https://ausgis.github.io/GD/articles/GD.md):
